params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.session
params.description: Required. The session in which the transaction runs.

params.name: data.request_options
params.description: Common options for this request. Priority is ignored for this request. Setting the priority in this request_options struct will not do anything. To set the priority for a transaction, set it on the reads and writes that are part of this transaction instead.
